mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_code AS reservationCode, NULL AS stayCode, r.customer_code AS customerCode, r.guest_count AS guestCount, r.property_code AS propertyCode, r.reservation_status AS reservationStatus, r.checkin_date AS checkinDate, r.checkout_date AS checkoutDate, NULL AS actualCheckinAt, NULL AS actualCheckoutAt FROM reservation r WHERE r.reservation_code = #{reservationCode}

SELECT r.reservation_code AS reservationCode, s.stay_code AS stayCode, r.customer_code AS customerCode, r.guest_count AS guestCount, r.property_code AS propertyCode, r.reservation_status AS reservationStatus, r.checkin_date AS checkinDate, r.checkout_date AS checkoutDate, s.actual_checkin_at AS actualCheckinAt, s.actual_checkout_at AS actualCheckoutAt FROM stay s JOIN reservation r ON s.reservation_code = r.reservation_code WHERE s.stay_code = #{stayCode}
SELECT r.checkout_date FROM stay s JOIN reservation r ON s.reservation_code = r.reservation_code WHERE s.stay_code = #{stayCode}
